tool_description: Pass a phone number and a confirmation URL to the API, user will receive a text message, if they confirm to login a post request will be sent to the  confirmation URL you provided.
name: One Step 2FA SMS
title: One Step 2FA SMS

api_list.name: Verify Login
api_list.description: Pass a phone number and a confirmation URL to this end point, the user will receive a text message on that phone number, if they confirm to login, a POST request will be sent to the  confirmation URL you provided.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://one-step-2fa-sms.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "one-step-2fa-sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://one-step-2fa-sms.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "one-step-2fa-sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
